issue.body:

comment.body: I'm using `Base filter`, `Tracking Protection filter`, `URL Tracking filter`, `Social media filter`, `Annoyances filter` and `Chinese filter`. I didn’t choose these filters when giving feedback because of lazy

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://shinden.pl/main](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fshinden.pl%2Fmain) ### Comment > Witam, po kliknięciu zaznaczonego plusa (na zdjęciu) wyskakują uciążliwe pop-upy a gdy próbuje dodatkowe okno wyłączyć zaczyna teleportować sie między dwoma punktami. comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1bV4y187TZ?p=20&vd_source=3b1f307f256b98d010de863bafb6cb38](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2Fvideo%2FBV1bV4y187TZ%3Fp%3D20%26vd_source%3D3b1f307f256b98d010de863bafb6cb38) ### Comment > 使用Global speed：视频速度控制后，芒果tv会自动开启视频，有的时候拦截不住，然后就开始播放视频，但是edge浏览器不会出现新的标签，就是播放一会儿声音后才被拦截 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/rey0ovlftfkwcg8kso4osc404gcg4wg4ajikuv4s2e.jpg?nc=1)
